title: Sound On: Capitol Stones and G20 Guests
itunes:title: Sound On: Capitol Stones and G20 Guests
description:
Bloomberg Government reporter Jack Fitzpatrick delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

He speaks with Ambassador James Jeffrey about the news of Presidents Xi and Putin attending the G20 in November. Plus, Jane Campbell, President and CEO of the US Capitol Historical Society, discusses the future status of the Capitol Stones

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
